title: La Vida Verde
description: A small organic shop carries raw vegan snacks, natural vegan body care products, henna and jagua temporary tattoos, vegan cooked and raw take out meals. As of December 2014, will be selling produce, juices and smoothies in the future; please inquire.
streetAddress: 3 KM east of the Delta Gas Station at Cuatro Cruces, Highway to Liberia
